creator: cer@acm.org
text:
I had a EJB deployment descriptor containing a <ejb-ref> to a class that wasn't 
in the srcdir.
ejbjar couldn't add it to the jar.
However, the code in GenericDeploymentTool that handles inner classes calls 
File.list()
File.list() can return null. 
However, the code wasn't checking for this and so innerfiles.length got a 
NullPointerException

creator: umagesh@apache.org
text: Patch applied to CVS on 02-02-02.  Nice date, eh? :-)  Thanks!
